General.Name: Development Works Food Co
General.Description: Development Works Food Company operates in the field of food and beverage in Saudi Arabia. It owns and operates various brands, including Juice Time for fresh juices and fruit salads. The company is also involved in the operation of restaurants and coffee shops, as well as refrigerated and frozen goods stores; food preparation kiosks; importing and exporting activities; and real estate activities. Development Works Food Company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: 2181 Dammam Branch Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 13243
